column4: if I download a package from http://packages.ubuntu.com/intrepid/firefox-3.0-branding with adept,synaptic or whatever package manager update it?
if there is a newer version in the repo's then yes, otherwise nope
right I was just making sure it was not like if you compile something by hand and then the package manager doesnt see it,  thanks
yep the pacakge manager will see it, and you can remove it from there
